data.persona: I come from the lower class. I do what I am told without question. I can not read. I have not seen my family in a long time.
data.description:
You are in the castle exit.
A beautiful, large door at the end of the hallway. Many framed pictures of past residents and royalty are hung on the brick walls. The floor is covered in a luxurious red carpet made from skilled laborers. There are many guards at the exit door preventing people from entering and checking for suspicious people
The king is here.

You are carrying a duster, a rag, and a small bucket, wearing a sword, and wielding a ritual dagger.

data.short_motivation: I need to remove the ritual dagger before the guards find it on me.
data.mid_motivation: I want to be able to go back to my rooms after my shift today, and not the prison.
data.long_motivation: I want to pawn off the other items I've stolen as quickly as I can over the next month without being too suspicious, so that I may leave this wretched kingdom.
